content.body: hello all.  i'd like to link to a single guide to "getting started with matrix for tc39 folk", e.g. selecting a client, registering an account, joining the key rooms.  otherwise we'll end up copying and pasting the same set of links/steps in IRC and issues whenever someone asks.  does such a doc exist?
ryzokuken: I found this doc, but it's for room setup, not user setup.  https://github.com/tc39/inclusion-group/blob/main/docs/matrix-setup.md
content.formatted_body: ryzokuken: I found this doc, but it's for room setup, not user setup. https://github.com/tc39/inclusion-group/blob/main/docs/matrix-setup.md
